answers.answer: You are probably holding your baby right if so congrats can't wait to see pictures I believe you will be the first july mommy!

Unfortunately, her lungs aren't mature yet.  :(  We just got the final results this morning.  So no baby yet.  We were so excited too.  But better to let her grow a little more if she isn't ready yet.  I have another appointment Monday, so hopefully we'll get some good news then.

question: Well, tomorrow I will be 37 weeks.  I go in at 6 am for an amnio to check for lung maturity.  If her lungs are mature, they plan to start the induction process tomorrow ( I have high bp and gestational diabetes).  So I could be holding my baby girl any day now!  We're so excited!  Wish us luck!  And today is my last day or work for 12 weeks!  Yay!  Good luck to all of the other July mommies!  Can't wait to see pictures of your little bundles of joy!
title: Maybe Baby Tomorrow
